channel.title: Crash Course in Jewish History: Classic Sinai Podcast
channel.itunes:description: Jewish audio mp3s for the curious mind.
channel.itunes:author: Rabbi Ken Spiro
channel.description: Even if you hated history, this fresh and humorous account from a Jewish perspective shows how relevant events of the past can help you in planning your future.
